divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a birthday party for my 88 year old grandmnother in san clemente with my whole family. My mother called me outside and pointed out the object. Our whole family including grandma saw it. It was larger than a plane since a plane was in the sky at the time, object was around the same altitude as the cloud layer. Was square in shape and was flashing all different colors, and changing shape! It looked kind of like a rubics cube twisting. If light came out of all the squares on a rubics cube that was twisting in the sky thats what we saw. I have never seen anything like this in my life, and I am pretty well self educated about aircraft. It moved away from our area until it looked like a star against the sky. Someone put a spot light up near the object so I know that lots of people probably saw this thing. My whole family saw it, and it was scary. PLEASE email me and let me know if there were other reports of this event. THANKS- Greg. PS im not a ufo enthusiast, before tonight i thought it was all BS.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in San Clemente
There were no other sightings in San Clemente on or around September 20th 2008
